Let's Begin

Important to know

The essentials of Norwegian language

Grammar

This is the building block of the Norwegian language. With this one can hold a conversation with native speakers.

Vocabulary

To strengthen the understanding of books, and how people are talking it is crucial to know the essential words in Norway.

Conversation

To hold a conversation or to listen to someone, it is excellent to know how people normally are talking together.
